author: Joey Guerra
description: Tangy, sweet and sour - Southern Comfort drinkers will love this.
name: Canteen Martini
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
45 ml Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
